trans-unit.source: Represents a set of query parameters that can be passed to a personalization provider using the various get and find methods.
trans-unit.target: 表示查詢參數可以傳遞至使用各種 get 個人化提供者，並尋找方法組。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This class is used as a parameter value for various get and find methods of a personalization provider, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別做為參數值用於各種 get 和尋找的個人化提供者，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A>方法

trans-unit.source: The default indexer allows generic access to the query parameters maintained by this object.
trans-unit.target: 預設索引子允許泛型存取這個物件所維護的查詢參數。

trans-unit.source: The three properties that are explicitly exposed by this class, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>, are stored using query key values that are the same as the property names of this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別所明確公開的三個屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>，並<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>會使用查詢，會與此類別的屬性名稱相同的索引鍵值來儲存、</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.Item%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.Item%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A instance of this class is used as a parameter value for various get and find methods of a personalization provider, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的執行個體做為參數值用於各種 get 和尋找的個人化提供者，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A>方法

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the query parameter.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定查詢參數的值。

trans-unit.source: This property is the default indexer for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是預設索引子<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery>

trans-unit.source: It returns the value of the query parameter indicated by `queryKey`.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回所指定的查詢參數的值`queryKey`。

trans-unit.source: You can use `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["UsernameToMatch"]`, `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["PathToMatch"]` and `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["UserInactiveSinceDate"]` to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用`PersonalizationStateQuery.this["UsernameToMatch"]`，`PersonalizationStateQuery.this["PathToMatch"]`和`PersonalizationStateQuery.this["UserInactiveSinceDate"]`設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>屬性，分別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: When these three properties are set in the indexer, they are validated against the proper type.
trans-unit.target: 當這三個屬性都設索引子中時，它們會根據適當的型別進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if `queryKey` does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回`null`如果`queryKey`不存在。

trans-unit.source: A case-insensitive query string.
trans-unit.target: 不區分大小寫的查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: The value should be one of the following: "PathToMatch", "UserInactiveSinceDate", or "UsernameToMatch".
trans-unit.target: 值應該是下列其中之一:"PathToMatch"、"UserInactiveSinceDate，"或"UsernameToMatch"。

trans-unit.source: The value of the query parameter indicated by the queryKey parameter.
trans-unit.target: 查詢參數的值所指示 queryKey 參數。

trans-unit.source: queryKey is .
trans-unit.target: queryKeyis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to be used for a query.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於查詢的路徑。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a path to match when executing queries.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會包含執行查詢時，符合的路徑。

trans-unit.source: If PathToMatch contains wildcard characters, they are passed through to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: 如果 PathToMatch 包含萬用字元，它們會傳遞至基礎資料存放區。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to `null`, indicating that a query should not filter based on path.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以設定為`null`，指出查詢是否應該篩選依據的路徑。

trans-unit.source: If this property is non-`null`, its value is trimmed.
trans-unit.target: 如果此屬性為非`null`，其值為修剪。

trans-unit.source: The path to be used for a query.
trans-unit.target: 要用於查詢的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the last active date used in a query.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於查詢的最後一個作用中的日期。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> property to filter against.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會指出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>要篩選的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The exact comparison is to include records where the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> is less than or equal to the value of the UserInactiveSinceDate property.
trans-unit.target: 確切的比較會包含的記錄位置的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>小於或等於 UserInactiveSinceDate 屬性的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>, indicating that a query should not filter based on the last activity date.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以設定為<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>，指出不應該篩選查詢為基礎的上次活動日期。</xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: The last active date to be used in a query.
trans-unit.target: 若要在查詢中使用的作用中最後一個日期。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name in a query.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在查詢中的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property represents the user name to filter against when executing a query.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性表示要執行查詢時，針對篩選的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: If UsernameToMatch contains wildcard characters, they are passed through to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UsernameToMatch 包含萬用字元，它們會傳遞至基礎資料存放區。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to `null`, indicating that a query should not filter based on the user name.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以設定為`null`，指出不應該篩選查詢為基礎的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: If this property is non-`null`, its value is trimmed.
trans-unit.target: 如果此屬性為非`null`，其值為修剪。

trans-unit.source: The user name to be used in a query.
trans-unit.target: 要查詢中使用的使用者名稱。
